duties_responsibilities.duty: Operate tractor-trailers, roll-off trucks, and dump trailers at the Solid Waste Transfer Station.
Drive yard truck and chassis/trailer combination safely and efficiently on-site.
May include driving a roll-off truck to various locations and on-site operations throughout the Transfer Station campus.
Work in shift rotations, including early days, early afternoons, and evenings until midnight/close.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or equivalent preferred
Commercial Driver’s License (CDL) Class A required
